Translations.Text: GOD NIE ZALUBA utterance zly language, unless JEDEN treated gross injustice. GOD bol Hearer Knower
If ona zavodny righteousness -either declared zatajit -pardon transgression GOD bol Pardoner Omnipotent
Those disbelieve GOD Jeho posol seek robit distinction GOD Jeho posol say My verit v some zamietnut some zelat nasledovat chodnicek v medzi
these bol real disbelievers. My chystat disbelievers shameful retribution
Mat rad for those verit v GOD Jeho posol robit nie distinction them He grant them ich recompense GOD bol Forgiver Merciful

Ludia scripture challenge ona bring them rezervovat si sky They ziadat Moses inak than saying Show us GOD physically! Consequently lightning struck them mat rad consequence ich audacity. Additionally they kult calf after all zazrak they seen. My pardoned all this. My supported Moses profound zazrak
My chov Mount Sinai them mat rad my berie ich covenant My said do them Zapisat zavora humbly My said do them nie desecrate Sabbath. Indeed my berie them solemn covenant
